title: What are some heart-touching sad songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Whiskey lullaby” by Braid paisley“Tears in Heaven” by Eric Clapton“Take away my pain” by Dream Theater“The one that gotaway” by Katy Perry“Fade to black” by Metallica“Rise above this “by Seether“So far away” by Avenged Sevenfold“Snuff “ by Slipknot“Happy Ending” by AvrilNote : This order is not sorted except for 1 and 2.

Here's mine: 1) With one more look at you / Barbara Streisand, 2) Should have never let you go / Neil& Dara Sedaka, 3) I'll never love again / Lady Gaga, 4) Without you / Mariah Carey, and my favorite 5) No good about goodbye / Shirley Bassey.
